alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 4:49PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Essex County through 515 PM EDT... At 449 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rogers Rock Campground, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crown Point Center, Paradox, Pharoah Mountain, Ironville, Mossy Point, Chilson, Coates Point, Black Point, Grass Island, Prison Island, and Spencer Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
